exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat p, q : pos n H : pos2nat p = pos2nat q Unable to unify "?M1446 = ?M1447" with "p = q".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
q: pos n
p: pos n

Goal:
pos2nat p = pos2nat q -> p = q

Premises:
pos2nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat
Notation pos := Fin.t
pos2nat_prop : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat p < n
Pnat.Pos2Nat.inj : forall p q : BinNums.positive, BinPos.Pos.to_nat p = BinPos.Pos.to_nat q -> p = q
pos_nxt_inj : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), pos_nxt p = pos_nxt q -> p = q
Fin.eqb_eq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true < -> p = q
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : pos m) (q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
Nat.divide_mul_split : forall n m p : nat, n <> 0 -> Nat.divide n (m * p) -> exists q r : nat, n = q * r /\ Nat.divide q m /\ Nat.divide r p
Nat.div_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> q = a / b
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q0 : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q0) -> p0 = q0 where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Nat.mod_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> r = a mod b
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- Type]
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Nat.gcd_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => Nat.gcd_unique x y (Nat.gcd x' y') (Nat.gcd_nonneg x' y') ((fun lemma : x = x' => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper Nat.divide_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation))) (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive (Nat.gcd x' y')) x x' lemma) Hx (Nat.gcd_divide_l x' y')) ((fun lemma : y = y' => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper Nat.divide_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (...
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q0 : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q0} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p0)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p0)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n q : pos n |- nat]

```coq
intros H.
apply Pnat.Pos2Nat.inj.
rewrite <- pos2nat_prop in H.
rewrite <- pos2nat_prop.
exact H.
Qed.
```

original: intros H. apply Pnat.Pos2Nat.inj. rewrite <- pos2nat_prop in H. rewrite <- pos2nat_prop. apply H.
